name: Jam on Rails
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #10 Theme: DIRECTION

You are a dispatcher who can change railway's direction and your mission is to deliver a train to its station. Your boss periodically sends to you new task cards with information about train destination. Try to carry as many trains as you can in the limited time.

Authors: D4rkof and Snkot.
